page.title: 05NEWSPAPERS
page.content: NEWSPAPERS .The people of the area get four local papers, the ''Clwyd Courier'', ''.The Wrexham Express'' and of greater importance ''The Evening Leader'' and the once weekly ''Wrexham Leader''.The ''Evening Leader'' comes out Monday to Friday and contains local and national news.The ''Wrexham Leader'' comes out on Friday and contains mainly local news.The other two newspapers are free newspapers. There is a lack of news and advertisements concerning the Erbistock area which suggests that the area relies on Ruabon , Wrexham and the surrounding area for shopping and entertainment.
